name: Eternal Gunna
description:
Hi, Eternal Gunna is a small shooter game made in 3 days for the Zenojam 3, it's our (me and Macbarette) very first experience at creating games. We enjoyed the process and hope you'll like the game.

This game was entirely made with Gamemaker Studio 2, Aseprite and Famistudio.

Graphics: Macbarette

Code: Gimleesan

Everything else: Gimleesan and Macbarette
